name: Best Western Plus Park City Hammarby Sj√∂stad

reviews.text:
An EXCELLENT value for money üëç Great breakfast and great service! Way to go!

1. The hotel is situated conveniently in 2 minutes from a tram station. At first we had a doubt that it would be far from the city center but it took up to 30 min of pretty picturesque way to get there.
2. The breakfast is a true Swedish buffet, lots of everything and no hurry.
3. The staff is very attentive, especially Alva who answered the email with the special request and found us the best room in the category. So grateful!
4. It‚Äôs clean and quiet and the curtains don‚Äôt let the light to disturb your sleep.
5. The room is very good with the superb panoramic view of Stockholm. Also, a very comfy area around the window for 2 people. Unforgettable experience.

The halls are a bit simplistic. And there was no fridge in our room. Also the clean up during breakfast could be better in the tables and faster in the breakfast stations.

Such a nice place to stay in Stockholm!

The location is about 4 minute walk to thr tram or bus. The hotel breakfast is amazing, I was here for 27 days and don't think I ate the same meal twice. The restaurant for dinner has excellent food and service. The front desk employees are friendly and helpful. They will go out of their way to help you.  The room service came at different tines to clean the room. I look forward to staying here again on my next visit.
This hotel located bit far from the city center, however, there is good connectivity to reach city center in 30 mins. Hotel is bit old and breakfast is average.

One of the nicest hotels in Stockholm.
Get a room above 10th floor and experience a great view.
Quite modern rooms and clean.
Showers are very Nice and clean.
Breakfast is very good.
Staff is always happy and helpful.
Well worth a visit!

Loved the warm welcome the receptionist gave us .A very helpful lady.
Rooms were spacious,clean and good facility,like iron,hair dryer,soap,shampoo,body lotion dispensers .
The route to airport was convenient using the 30 number tram and changing at Arstaberg into a train  number 41 going to Marsta station.Take the 283/279 to Terminal 5/4/3/2
